Simple combiniStacking example:
õ̭ (o + combining minus sign below + tilde)
à̧ (a + cedilla + grave)
ȩ̄̀ (e + cedilla + macron + grave - 3 marks)
o̰̍̃ (o + tilde below + combining vertical line above + tilde - 3 marks)
ạ̧̨̱̤̀́̂̃̄ (a + 9 combining marks)
ứ̛̀̉̃̄ (u + horn + acute + grave + hook above + tilde + macron - 6 marks)

Stacking above and below:
ḛ̄̀ (e with breve below + macron + grave)
ṳ́̄ (u with diaeresis below + acute + macron)
ṉ̈̃ (n with line below + diaeresis + tilde)
ḁ̊̀ (a with ring below + ring above + grave)
ị̂̃ (i with dot below + circumflex + tilde)

Complex Vietnamese example:
ừ (u + horn + grave)
ử (u + horn + hook above)
ữ (u + horn + tilde)
ự (u + horn + dot below)

IPA phonetic stacking:
ɛ̃̄̀ (epsilon + tilde + macron + grave)
ɔ̣̃̂ (open o + dot below + tilde + circumflex)
ə̃̄̀ (schwa + tilde + macron + grave)

Zalgo-style (heavy combining):aracter test:

Basic vowels with diacritics:
á é í ó ú (acute accent)
à è ì ò ù (grave accent)
ä ë ï ö ü (diaeresis/umlaut)
â ê î ô û (circumflex)
ã õ ñ (tilde)

Multiple combining marks:
e̋ (e + double acute)
ǫ́ (o with ogonek + acute)
ę̃ (e with ogonek + tilde)

Stacking example:
õ̭ (o + combining minus sign below + tilde)
à̧ (a + cedilla + grave)

Zalgo-style (heavy combining):
H̷̡̪̯ͨ͊̽̅̾̎Ȩ̬̩̾͛ͪ̈́̀́͘ ̶̧̨̱̹̭̯ͧ̾ͬC̷̙̲̝͖ͭ̏ͥͮ͟Oͮ͏̮̪̝͍M̲̖͊̒ͪͩͬ̚̚͜Ȇ̴̟̟͙̞ͩ͌͝S̨̥̫͎̭ͯ̿̔̀ͅ

Hello world with combining:
Ḧëllö Ẅöṙlḋ!

Mathematical symbols with combining:
x̄ (x-bar, mean)
ẋ (x-dot, derivative)
x⃗ (x-vector)
